summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE BRAKE PEDAL NEEDED TO BE APPLIED WITH AN EXCESSIVE FORCE IN ORDER TO SAFELY STOP THE VEHICLE WHILE BEING OPERATED AT LOWER SPEEDS. THE FAILURE OCCURRED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO BE DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 51,000.  UPDATED 02/21/17*LJ
